DOC.brief_summary: The goal of the present study is to look at the effect of changing walking parameters on the dynamic walking characteristics among children post severe traumatic brain injury, and typically developed controls.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Walking Kinetic of Children Who Suffer Central Nervous System (CNS) Damage
